channel.title: This is the portfolio and blog of Dr. Majid Al Qassimi in the realm of Woodworking and Design.
channel.description: This is the portfolio and blog of Dr. Majid Al Qassimi in the realm of Woodworking and Design.

item.title: Tri-Harder
item.description:
Tri-Harder

Working late with Arman, we work into the night to explore how to cut and assemble the complex shapes for my work.

item.title: Olmo Desk
item.description:
Olmo Desk

Olmo desk is a table thinked for designers and architects who works in small places. Inspired by the Chinese boxes. The 1:5 scale model is totally handmade. Model dimensions: 12cm x 26 cm x 16 cm. Enjoy!

item.title: Waiting for the Weather to Work
item.description:
Waiting for the Weather to Work

Waiting for the weather to finally allow me back to work. Im tired of the heat and humidity!
